title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.26 - Loss or damage-Port Authority not liable
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.26 - Loss or damage-Port Authority not liable

State Regulations

The Port Authority shall not be liable for loss or damage
to any watercraft or to any merchandise or cargo at a terminal resulting from
any cause whatsoever where such cause is beyond its control or not due to its
failure to use reasonable care. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
